history.narrative: Law 15-295, the “Apprenticeship Requirements Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-884, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-691 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-295 became effective on April 8, 2005.
